marklogic.body: I'm sorry this happened to him. Both the depression, the Anxiety and then having his beloved pets killed in such a manner. I will say that by doing his best to change things for the better because of this experience, he will be helped because he's chosing to Reach out to a cause that is higher and for greater good than just himself and his circumstances. There are all sorts of benefits to what he's doing, so I wish him the best of luck.
